General.Name: SenesTech Inc
General.Description: SenesTech, Inc. develops a technology for managing animal pest populations through fertility control. The company offers ContraPest, a liquid bait that limits reproduction of male and female rats. SenesTech, Inc. was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Phoenix, Arizona.
General.Address: 23460 North 19th Avenue, Phoenix, AZ, United States, 85027
